thread.title: Man Utd transfer news: Club sets date to begin contract talks with Michael Carrick | Metro News
thread.title_full: Man Utd transfer news: Club sets date to begin contract talks with Michael Carrick | Metro News

author: Coral Barry For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Man Utd transfer news: Club sets date to begin contract talks with Michael Carrick | Metro News
text:
Michael Carrick’s contract talks with Manchester United hierarchy will begin after EFL Cup final gossip Coral Barry for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 15 Feb 2017 10:27 am Michael Carrick is on a one-year rolling contract (Picture: Getty) 
Manchester United have reportedly informed Michael Carrick that talks over his future at the club will begin after the EFL Cup final. ‘How can Gibbs be captain?!’ Man Utd legend Roy Keane TEARS into Arsenal flops 
Southampton stand in Jose Mourinho’s way to a trophy in his debut season, but Carrick is still in the dark on whether he will be part of United’s future. 
Mourinho has already cast serious doubt over his future by hinting the midfielder is too old to be given a new contract. 
Carrick has been on a one-year rolling contracts for the past two years at United, but could finally be released as he creeps towards turning 36. Carrick at United Singed from Tottenham in 2006 Games: 445 Goals: 23 Assist: 36 Trophies: Premier League x 5, Champions League x 1, FA Cup x 1, League Cup x 1 Individual honours: PFA Team of the Year 2003/2004 & 2012/13 Carrick has forced his way back into Jose Mourinho’s side (Picture: Getty) 
The Times claim Carrick’s representatives will meet with United executive vice-chairman Ed Woodward after the EFL Cup final on February 26. 
Mourinho is currently pursuing Monaco midfielder Tiemoue Bakayoko whose arrival at the club could pave the way for Carrick to end a ten-year stay at the club. 
Carrick joined the Red Devils in 2006 and has fought his way back into the side this season after being used sparingly in the early days of Mourinho’s reign. Manchester United have a 72 per cent win rate when Carrick starts a game (Picture: Getty)
